name: WhatsApp Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 WhatsApp Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle WhatsApp events via webhooks

whatsAppNotice.displayName: Due to Facebook API limitations, you can use just one WhatsApp trigger for each Facebook App
whatsAppNotice.name: whatsAppNotice
whatsAppNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due to Facebook API limitations, you can use just one WhatsApp trigger for each Facebook App

updates.name: updates
updates.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: messageStatusUpdates (值: None) - WhatsApp sends notifications to the Trigger when the status of a message changes (for example from Sent to Delivered and from Delivered to Read). To avoid multiple executions for one WhatsApp message, you can set the Trigger to execute only on selected message status updates.
